dmv.spring.demo.rest.exceptionhandler

Class ExceptionHandlers

  • java.lang.Object
    • dmv.spring.demo.rest.exceptionhandler.ExceptionHandlers

  • @RestControllerAdvice
public class ExceptionHandlers
extends java.lang.Object
    Maps Persistence Layer Exceptions to HTTP codes. Also other errors will be caught and mapped.
    Author:
    dmv
